name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full-Stack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance B2B and SaaS software solutions. Expert in both frontend and backend technologies including **Python**, **TypeScript**, and **APIs**. Proven proficiency in modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, along with backend frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**. Adept at integrating cloud services on **Azure** and **AWS**, specializing in secure and compliant solutions that adhere to standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
Demonstrated ability to lead the development of enterprise-level applications that incorporate integrations and advanced security measures. Strong focus on compliance and security, ensuring software meets necessary regulatory standards. Practical experience in building scalable systems with a solid understanding of microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, enhancing delivery speed and product quality. Passionate about leveraging technology to create impactful solutions, with hands-on expertise in MLOps using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:

• Developed robust frontend applications with frameworks such as **React (17–18)** and **Next.js**, creating seamless user experiences for B2B and SaaS products.
• Launched and maintained API integrations, ensuring high performance and security standards are met, tailored for both backend and frontend components.
• Spearheaded re-architecture initiatives to transition monolithic applications into microservices, utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)** for enhanced scalability and reliability.
• Designed cloud-native data architectures with databases like **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, managing and querying large datasets effectively for financial and healthcare applications.
• Implemented and evaluated machine learning models for critical use cases, employing **scikit-learn** and **PyTorch**, to optimize business processes in patient risk assessment and fraud detection.
• Established MLOps pipelines using **MLflow** and **Apache Airflow** for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) of machine learning models, ensuring version control and consistent performance in production.
• Integrated AI-driven features into applications, providing personalized recommendations and insights powered by Azure ML and AWS Sagemaker.
• Developed enterprise DevOps pipelines employing **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, resulting in a streamlined development lifecycle through automated testing and multi-environment deployments with comprehensive security checks.
• Created complex financial data visualization tools using **D3.js**, delivering real-time insights into transaction trends and operational KPIs to enhance decision-making processes.
• Collaborated with data scientists in the implementation of NLP models for document parsing, integrating these capabilities into core services via RESTful APIs.
• Established comprehensive test strategies utilizing **Jest** and **Cypress**, ensuring code quality across unit, integration, and end-to-end testing for both front-end and backend services.
• Integrated **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch** to support advanced search functionalities across extensive health records and financial documents.

• Developed and modernized financial platforms by leveraging **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **TypeScript** in both **frontend** and **backend** development, enhancing scalability and maintainability for systems handling over **1M transactions daily**.
• Designed and implemented secure and compliant **APIs** utilizing cutting-edge frameworks such as **Node.js** (NestJS/Express), ensuring seamless **integrations** with various **B2B** and **SaaS** solutions while adhering to industry regulations.
• Crafted dynamic user-focused **frontend** applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive interfaces that improved user engagement by **30%**.
• Integrated systems with event-driven architectures using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, enhancing real-time processing of transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows with an average response time improvement of **40%**.
• Engineered and orchestrated **ETL** pipelines employing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting batch and real-time data ingestion from numerous sources, increasing data processing efficiency by **25%**.
• Developed AI/ML-based fraud detection solutions utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns to preemptively flag suspicious activities, effectively reducing fraud rates by **20%**.
• Established robust ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enabling real-time model inference directly integrated into backend services.

• Developed and optimized **backend** services utilizing **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), achieving **99.9%** uptime and low latency across critical components like checkout and order fulfillment.
• Crafted **API** integrations for real-time functionalities using WebSockets powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating dynamic updates and responsive customer interactions.
• Built **frontend** applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, employing **TypeScript**, enhancing performance and responsiveness for **over 500K** users across web and mobile.
• Executed data management with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, ensuring data access efficiency and scalability for high-traffic e-commerce processes with **5ms** average response time.
• Implemented AI/ML recommendation systems using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, resulting in a **20%** increase in conversion rates through personalized user experiences.
• Administered **Redis** caching to optimize application speed for product metadata and shopping cart sessions, leading to an improved load time of **30%**.
• Deployed feature flags and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring smooth transitions and A/B testing capabilities during major updates.
• Designed responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce interfaces with **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and HTML5/CSS3, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) and a **30%** uplift in mobile user engagement.
• Established secure payment processing workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, adhering to PCI compliance and implementing tokenized transactions.
• Ensured data security through role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, maintaining GDPR compliance and safeguarding user information throughout the platform.
